group_1.textRight: ...*Sob*...@...I tried so hard...
I'm... bummed...

group_1.textLeft: The reason you feel that way is because you@sincerely fought with the intention of defeating me.
...It's a sign that you two have matured.

group_1.textRight: Huh...

group_1.textLeft: We've been praised...? By the Instructor...?

group_1.textCenter: (Her Highness would probably be... hiding before@attacking me at the first sign of an opening.)
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:1031A01]...But first, I'm going to ask you to come out@to the front.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, she's going to shoot in all directions@to force Hime out...!

group_1.textRight: Himena is...

group_1.textCenter: Hold it, hold it!@That's too much firepower!!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102900:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Whoa?!@Princess, d-don't come over here!

group_1.textRight: Then you help me, Miwarin!

group_1.textLeft: ...D-don't drag me into this!

group_1.textCenter: Only cowards use the spectators as shields!@It's not fair!!

group_1.textLeft: Whatchu getting so upset about, Instructor?!@Sooo O-O-C of you!

group_1.textRight: ...Is THIS your strategy this time?

group_1.textLeft: This cutie's already seen the results of a fair fight.
I'll do whatever it takes to beat my Instructor,@even if it means playing dirty★

group_1.textRight: (It's fine to try to outsmart your opponent by@assessing the difference in your strength@between you and them.)
(But sometimes you have to think about taking@the fight to the front.)
(Your perspective is still too narrow, Princess.)
(...If she doesn't come from the front,@I'll just deal with her like I always do.)
[flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2](Concentrating magic power on reloading...)
(I'll turn you into dust with a barrage of bullets@that shall obliterate everything, even you...!)

group_1.textLeft: I've been waiting... for this moment!

group_1.textRight: [chara:103100:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite1]Yaaah!

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashRed1][chara:103100:effect_shake]Nngh?!
(A head-on attack... from the front?!)

group_1.textLeft: How do you like that, Instructor?@A shot to the face!
Ah...

group_1.textRight: ...I broke your glass bead, Princess.@I won.

group_1.textLeft: Dammit... I totally forgot about the rules@when I was about to give you a shot...

group_1.textRight: How come? You're the one who started@the whole thing...

group_1.textLeft: Well, that's 'cause we had other objectives.
I toldja that if you win, you can tell us one thing,@anything. Remember?
That's what you were going for, no?

group_1.textRight: ...What do you mean?

group_1.textLeft: You've got something you wanna say to us,@don'tcha?
You're free to be mad about yesterday...@Don't be afraid to tell us.
...Huh...?@Did this cutie read you wrong...?

group_1.textRight: Erm... What did you think about yesterday,@Your Highness?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I might've overstepped into something@you're concerned about...
...You didn't say a thing, today or yesterday.
But, I figured your position as an "instructor"@might've made it hard for you to express your@true feelings.
So, perhaps, after a full-on fight...
We'd get to forget about instructors, leaders and@all that, and just let it all out★

group_1.textRight: ...*Sigh*...@What's with that shounen manga-esque logic...

group_1.textLeft: For real though, I think we did our best in the fight,@y'know?
We analyzed the issues you were trying to@communicate...
And overcame them in our own way★

group_1.textRight: ...I suppose so.
Miyabi and Azumi, who had a defeatist attitude,@made an earnest attempt at defeating me.
And Princess, you tried to broaden your horizons@by challenging me to a head-on competition.
I'm deeply moved by the growth of all three of you.

group_1.textLeft: Really...?!

group_1.textRight: Certainly, but there's only one thing I've been@wanting to say since yesterday.
With how weak you three are, there is no way@we'll be able to make it to the top.

group_1.textLeft: Ugh... I knew it...

group_1.textRight: ...Heh, just kidding.
Truth is, I wanted to apologize for what I said@yesterday.

group_1.textLeft: ...What?! Why...?!

group_1.textRight: It's uncool and childish, I know.
But, you see, when I'm in my hometown, I tend to@talk in a pampered manner as I did yesterday.
I'm sorry for taking it out on you just because@I was embarrassed.

group_1.textLeft: This cutie's sorry too!
I'll try not to say stuff you wouldn't like anymore,@Instructor!

group_1.textRight: ...Mhm.

group_1.textLeft: That said, y'know, you really were cute though★
I love that lil' sis-like side of you too, Instructor!

group_1.textRight: ...You don't have to share those sentiments either...

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad you seem to have sorted it all out, but...

group_1.textCenter: Is it okay if we ask about that topic...?

group_1.textRight: Miyu still has nooo idea what's going on here...
Oh...@Sorry, we'll talk about it on our way back.
